original_body_lines: With the aim of providing overseas market opportunities for Sri Lankan handicraft products, a "Crafting Ceylon" export-oriented design development Exhibition held at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) today. The inauguration was made under the patronage of President Ranil Wickremesinghe, Industries and Plantations Minister  Ramesh Pathirana, and Small and Medium Enterprises Development State Minister Prasanna Ranaweera. Pix by Kithsiri De Mel
